{%= include("install") %}

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var set = require('{%= name %}');

var obj = {};
set(obj, 'a.b.c', 'd');
console.log(obj);
//=> {a: {b: c: 'd'}}
```
